static.description: Family home, four-bed semi-detached with small garden, located on the north side of Nottingham (Arnold area).
static.location: North side of Nottingham, Arnold area

timeline.citation: CLIENT2: [00:03:22] We looked on Rightmove a few months ago. Similar ones were around three thirty, three fifty. CLIENT1: [00:03:29] Yeah, last one on our street went for just under three forty, so we’ve been saying mid‑three hundreds.
CLIENT1: [00:03:50] I checked the app last week. It was one forty‑seven, maybe one forty‑eight thousand. Somewhere there.
CLIENT1: [00:04:00] Yeah, two‑year fix. Runs until October next year. I think the rate’s three point… three point one nine percent.
CLIENT1: [00:08:47] Mortgage is… I want to say seven seventy‑something. Call it about seven eighty a month. CLIENT2: [00:08:54] Yeah, it’s just under eight hundred.

static.description: 50% share in a one-bedroom flat in Blackpool, inherited from mother, jointly owned with brother.

timeline.citation: CLIENT2: [00:14:40] Estate agent said maybe ninety to a hundred thousand for the whole thing, if we sold. That was last year though.
CLIENT2: [00:14:26] My mum left me half of her little flat in Blackpool. It’s in my name and my brother’s name.
CLIENT1: [00:14:46] So Margaret’s half is like forty‑five to fifty, if you split it.
CLIENT2: [00:14:52] No mortgage. Mum paid it off ages ago.
CLIENT2: [00:14:30] We get rent, but it mostly just goes straight to the managing agent and maintenance.
